The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 08 January is 2,559,581 (4,547.4 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 03 January, there were 352,467 new confirmed cases (626.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 27 December, there were 241,589 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 46% (110,878 extra cases).
